show.subtitle: Connect the Dots promotes health activism, linking personal health to the health of our culture, society, and environment.
show.title: Connect The Dots

title: Connect The Dots
content:
Today on Connect the Dots at 10 AM ET in Helen Caldicott: The Health and Ecological Consequences of Fukushima, Alison... <!--more--> Rose Levy speaks with the premiere anti-nuclear activist leader, Helen Caldicott, about the biology of radiation impacts and their effects on people, food, and species internationally.
You can learn more by watching her recent symposium at www.helencaldicott.com
